description: Froakie (ケロマツ), the Bubble Frog Pokémon, is the Water-type starter Pokémon. The ruff around its neck is actually made of bubbles which it uses to protect itself from attacks. In the anime, Ash Ketchum meets Froakie during his first day in the Kalos Region who becomes one of his first Pokémon in the region.
name: Keromatsu
